com.stormpath.sdk.provider

Class Providers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stormpath.sdk.provider.Providers

  • public final class Providers
extends Object
    Static utility/helper methods serving Provider-specific ProviderRequestFactorys. For example, to construct an account request: 
     ProviderAccountResult result = application.getAccount(Providers.GOOGLE.account()
     .setAccessToken("ya29.1.AADtN_VdFRceSUrSpQWlh4m38igAjOLxCsTx1B7HRWzWoD4RsphiTheV66_56Mhi")
     .build());
    or, to create a new Provider-based Directory: 
     Directory directory = client.instantiate(Directory.class);
 directory.setName("My Facebook Directory");
 ...
 directory = tenant.createDirectory(Directories.newCreateRequestFor(directory)
     .forProvider(Providers.FACEBOOK.builder()
                  .setClientId("624508218317020")
                  .setClientSecret("d0ad961d45fgc0210c0c7d67e8f1w800")
                  .build())
     .build());
    Since:
    1.0.beta

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FacebookRequestFactory FACEBOOK
      Returns a new FacebookRequestFactory instance, used to construct Facebook requests, like Facebook Account creation and retrieval.
      static GoogleRequestFactory GOOGLE
      Returns a new GoogleRequestFactory instance, used to construct Google requests, like Google Directory creation.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Returns a new GoogleRequestFactory instance, used to construct Google requests, like Google Directory creation.

        Returns a new FacebookRequestFactory instance, used to construct Facebook requests, like Facebook Account creation and retrieval.
